trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter for a property representing a field in a data source schema.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> class to convert object types before assignment to a control property.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> classe para converter tipos de objetos antes de atribuição em uma propriedade de controle.

trans-unit.source: In general, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> supports converting string object types and supplies a list of standard values available for assignment to the associated control property.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> oferece suporte à conversão de tipos de objeto de cadeia de caracteres e fornece uma lista de valores padrão disponíveis para atribuição para a propriedade do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The standard values collection is the list of fields in the data source schema for the current control.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de valores padrão é a lista de campos no esquema de fonte de dados para o controle atual.

trans-unit.source: To support converting additional object types, derive a class from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> methods for the additional object types.
trans-unit.target: Para dar suporte à conversão de tipos de objeto adicionais, derive uma classe de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> e substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> métodos para os tipos de objeto adicionais.

trans-unit.source: To support a custom list of standard assignable values, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para dar suporte a uma lista personalizada de valores padrão de pode ser atribuídos, substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Apply the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute to specify the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> class as the type converter for a control property.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> atributo para especificar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> classe como conversor de tipo para uma propriedade de controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> class use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> as the property type converter.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.SortExpression%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> classe e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> classe use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> como o conversor de tipo de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: Você nunca deve acessar diretamente um conversor de tipo.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, chame o conversor apropriado usando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte os exemplos em <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method indicates that the converter supports returning a list of available values through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> método indica que o conversor dá suporte a retornar uma lista de valores disponíveis por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method indicates that the list is not an exclusive list of possible values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> método indica que a lista não é uma lista exclusiva de valores possíveis.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter" /> class.
You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: Você nunca deve acessar diretamente um conversor de tipo.

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, chame o conversor apropriado usando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte os exemplos em <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.
The type to convert from.
Indicates whether the specified source type can be converted to the type of the associated control property.
<see langword="true" /> if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

Call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method supports converting the source type.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> método para determinar se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> método dá suporte à conversão do tipo de fonte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method can convert only from a string, so the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method returns `true` when `sourceType` is a string.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> método pode converter apenas de uma cadeia de caracteres, portanto, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> método retorna `true` quando `sourceType` é uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.
The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that can be used to support localization features.
The object to convert.
Converts the specified object to the type of the associated control property.
An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> instance that represents the converted object.
If `value` is a string, then the string representation of `value` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se `value` é uma cadeia de caracteres e, em seguida, a representação de cadeia de caracteres de `value` é retornado.

trans-unit.source: If `value` is `null`, an empty string ("") is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se `value` é `null`, uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("") será retornado.

trans-unit.source: For all other specified values, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Para todos os outros valores especificados, um <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exceção será lançada.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method supports converting the source type.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> método para determinar se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> método dá suporte à conversão do tipo de fonte.

trans-unit.source: The conversion could not be performed.
Returns a list of available values that can be assigned to a control property.
An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.
Returns a list of available values that can be assigned to the associated control property.
A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> containing available values for assignment to the associated control property.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method uses the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.Instance%2A> property of the specified `context` object to obtain an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor> implementation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> método usa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.Instance%2A> propriedade especificada `context` para obter um <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor> implementação.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor> implementation is available, it is used to access the data source schema for the associated control at design time and retrieve the list of available fields from the associated data source schema view.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor> implementação está disponível, ele é usado para acessar o esquema de fonte de dados para o controle associado em tempo de design e recuperar a lista de campos disponíveis da exibição de esquema da fonte de dados associada.

trans-unit.source: The collection of available values is built from the fields in the data source schema for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de valores disponíveis é criada a partir de campos no esquema de fonte de dados para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.
A type used to filter fields to include in the standard values list.
Returns a list of available values that can be assigned to the associated control property.
A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection" /> containing available values for assignment to the associated control property.
An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.
Indicates whether this converter returns a list containing all possible values that can be assigned to the associated control property.
<see langword="true" /> if this converter returns a list containing all possible values that can be assigned to the associated control property; otherwise <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> returns `false`, indicating that the list returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method is not an exclusive list of all possible assignable values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> método para um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> retorna `false`, indicando que a lista retornada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> método não é uma lista exclusiva de todos os possíveis valores pode ser atribuídos.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> implementation that can be used to gain additional context information.
Indicates whether this converter returns a set of available values for assignment to a control property within the specified context.
<see langword="true" /> if this converter returns a standard set of available values for assignment to the associated control property; otherwise <see langword="false" />.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method indicates whether the converter supports returning a list of available values through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> método indica se o conversor dá suporte ao retorno de uma lista de valores disponíveis por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> object returns `true` if the specified `context` object supplies an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor> implementation in its <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.Instance%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> método para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter> objeto retorna `true` se especificado `context` objeto fornece um <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor> implementação em seu <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.Instance%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor> implementation to retrieve the list of available fields from the associated data source schema.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceViewSchemaConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> método usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSourceViewSchemaAccessor> implementação para recuperar a lista de campos disponíveis do esquema de fonte de dados associados.
